entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
